title: Honoring
body: So i was suspended a few months ago and ever since than i wasn't able to get any honor levels even if i got honors from each game i could never get any levels. some weeks ago i got this message that i was able to obtain more honor levels but then still i wasn't able to could anyone help?

replies.body: LostFr0st provided some really great details, check it out!  A recent incident results in your honor dropping to 0, and based on the severity it's going to take quite a bit to restore it.  Things seem to be going smoothly and your honor is returning at a steady pace.   Make sure to stay consistent and positive, and you'll get there!

> [{quoted}](name=Banana Slice,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=hHw2ZGXM,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-01-05T18:26:50.933+0000)
>
> So i was suspended a few months ago and ever since than i wasn&#039;t able to get any honor levels even if i got honors from each game i could never get any levels.

Yes, getting suspended locks out all honour progress for a while.

>some weeks ago i got this message that i was able to obtain more honor levels but then still i wasn&#039;t able to

This means that _gaining_ honour was unlocked.
Now one can work towards level 1 honour.

>could anyone help?

I will try.

How it works is that honour is gained whenever a neural or positive game is played, even without getting honoured after a game.

If a negative game (passive aggressiveness, harassing teammates) or other negative behaviours are detected, then the honour progress takes a step backwards.

So, between the good and bad games the account may not actually be moving in honour at all.
Best way to be sure is to /muteall and not type.

Here's a post from a guy who made it to lvl 2 as example:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/BAU3ir8A-from-honor-0-to-honor-2
